headline: 1 Warren Buffett Stock to Buy Hand Over Fist and 1 to Avoid
summary: Warren Buffett is arguably the greatest investor of all time.  There are countless ways to follow Buffett's genius by sifting through Berkshire Hathaway's portfolio.  Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B) CEO and Chairman Warren Buffett needs no introduction.
